DOC.brief_summary: The World Health Organisation warn influenza pandemic inevitable . The avian influenza strain H5N1 one lead candidate cause next influenza pandemic . Children likely special target group vaccination ; therefore , study test safety immunogenicity H5N1 pandemic influenza vaccine healthy child .
